description:
Kogoro agrees to conduct an interview with spirit detective Hotta and heads to a hotel with Conan for a meeting. After meeting up with Toto TV`s Kokuri, they go to Hotta`s room, but there`s no answer. As they`re standing outside the room, Kokuri notices an email he received from Hotta saying, "They`re going to kill me. Help." Around 9 AM, Kogoro and the others have a bellhop unlock the door and enter the room. Kogoro spots someone fleeing from the balcony. In the bed is Hotta`s body, stabbed numerous times in the chest...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L’affaire du médium détective assassiné (1re partie)
霊魂探偵殺害事件 (前編)
